name: kentico-cloud-delivery-node-sdk
author: richard sustek
description: Official Kentico Cloud Delivery SDK for node

scripts.test: gulp build && node test/nodejs/app && node test/official/node-js/index && node test/test-completed
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test && node test/test-completed
scripts.new-patch: npm version patch && npm run update-sdk-info
scripts.new-minor: npm version minor && npm run update-sdk-info
scripts.new-major: npm version major && npm run update-sdk-info
